settings.heading: Skin, Immunity, Liver  and beyond
settings.text: Glutathione offers powerful protection against free radicals, and may assist with natural liver cleanse, enhance immunity, and promote skin radiance.

settings.heading: Joint, Heart, and Brain Health
settings.text: Enjoy the many benefits of one of the most powerful herbs in the world of enhanced joint, heart, and brain health, strong immunity, and overall well-being.

settings.heading: Memory, Focus, and Clarity
settings.text: Improve your mental performance and enjoy better memory, acuity, and concentration with our powerful formula, packed with all the best vitamins and herbal extracts for your brain.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?

settings.title: How can I update my shipping information?
settings.faq_answer: Your shipping address and information can be updated in the Account Details in your account.

settings.title: How can I modify or cancel my order?
settings.faq_answer: Please reach out to us at support@shopnaturescraft.com

settings.title: How long will it take my order to arrive?
settings.faq_answer: You should receive your order in 3-5 business days once it has shipped. However, due to the effects of the pandemic on global logistics, there may be delays with transit times.
